statements: SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source, concentration FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2';
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE concentration > 10;
SELECT source, pollutant_type, concentration FROM pollutants WHERE source = 'Factory A';
SELECT DISTINCT pollutant_type FROM pollutants;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE concentration > 10 ORDER BY source ASC
SELECT source, AVG(concentration) AS avg_concentration FROM pollutants GROUP BY source HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT pollutant_type, MAX(concentration) AS max_concentration FROM pollutants GROUP BY pollutant_type ORDER BY max_concentration DESC
SELECT id, source, pollutant_type, concentration FROM pollutants WHERE source LIKE '%car%' AND pollutant_type = 'CO2'
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE concentration BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT * FROM Sources;
SELECT id, name FROM Sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Sources WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Pollutants WHERE type = 'Harmful';
SELECT name, type FROM Pollutants WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Sources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM Pollutants WHERE type = 'Gas';
SELECT id, name, type FROM Pollutants WHERE source_id = 3 ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT name, location FROM Sources JOIN Pollutants ON Sources.id = Pollutants.source_id WHERE Pollutants.type = 'Liquid';
SELECT * FROM PollutantSources;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM PollutantSources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SiteRemediation ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT type_name FROM PollutantTypes WHERE type_description LIKE '%hazardous%';
SELECT site_name, start_date, end_date FROM SiteRemediation WHERE remediation_id = 5;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM PollutantSources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT type_name, type_description FROM PollutantTypes WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PollutantSources ORDER BY source_location DESC;
SELECT site_name, start_date, end_date FROM SiteRemediation WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM PollutantSources WHERE source_location LIKE '%Industrial%';
SELECT source_id, source_name, pollutant_type FROM sources_of_pollutants
SELECT source_name, source_type, pollutant_type FROM sources_of_pollutants ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT site_name, location FROM contaminated_sites WHERE remediation_status = 'Pending'
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, plan_status FROM remediation_plan ORDER BY plan_status
SELECT pollutant_name, units FROM pollutant_types
SELECT * FROM sources_of_pollutants ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM sources_of_pollutants WHERE pollutant_type = 'Chemical' ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT site_name, location, remediation_status FROM contaminated_sites WHERE remediation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT plan_id, site_name, plan_status FROM remediation_plan JOIN contaminated_sites ON remediation_plan.site_id = contaminated_sites.site_id WHERE plan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT pollutant_name, units FROM pollutant_types WHERE units = 'ppm';
SELECT * FROM pollutants;
SELECT name, type FROM pollutants WHERE type='Air';
SELECT source_id, COUNT(*) FROM pollutants GROUP BY source_id;
SELECT site_name, location, remediation_plan FROM site_info ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT sample_id, site_id, quantity FROM samples WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, type FROM pollutants WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sources WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT site_name, location, remediation_plan FROM site_info WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT a.name AS pollutant_name, b.name AS contaminant_name, s.quantity FROM pollutants a JOIN samples s ON a.pollutant_id = s.pollutant_id JOIN contaminants b ON s.contaminant_id = b.contaminant_id;

SELECT s.site_name, p.name AS pollutant_name, c.type AS contaminant_type FROM site_info s JOIN samples sam ON s.site_id = sam.site_id JOIN pollutants p ON sam.pollutant_id = p.pollutant_id JOIN contaminants c ON sam.contaminant_id = c.contaminant_id ORDER BY s.site_name ASC;
